price: Ṣé wọ́n fàyà balẹ̀ pé ohun tí ń bo ẹ̀dá mọ́lẹ̀ nínú ìyà Allāhu kò lè dé bá àwọn ni tàbí pé Àkókò náà kò lè kò lé àwọn lórí ní òjijì, tí wọn kò sì níí fura?
arabic: أَفَأَمِنُوٓاْ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُمۡ غَٰشِيَةٞ مِّنۡ عَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: afa-aminū an tatiyahum ghāshiyatun min ʿadhābi al-lahi aw tatiyahumu al-sāʿatu baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
